img.title: Southern Fulton Jr/Sr High School
img.alt: Southern Fulton Jr/Sr High School Building

span.p: The SFSD will be providing bagged meals (breakfast and lunch) during the month of May. Meals will be prepared by our kitchen staff at the Elementary school. Meals will be provided to any and all students starting on Friday, May 1 at the elementary school from 11:30 a.m. - 1:00 p.m. Students MUST be present at pick-up to receive the food. You will remain in your car and be handed the items as all social distancing rules will be in effect. After the initial pick-up on Friday, May 1, meals will be provided every Monday and Thursday from 11:30 a.m. - 1:00 p.m. When you arrive on Monday you will receive meals for Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday. When you arrive on Thursday you will receive meals for Thursday and Friday. There will not be a pick-up on Memorial Day. When you pick up on Thursday, May 21st you will receive meals for 5 days. The last day for meal pick-ups will be Thursday, May 28th.

Muffins, cereal bar, bagel, cinnamon roll, cereal bowl
Juice
Milk
*Food may vary due to food shortages by suppliers.

p.a: Southern Fulton SD District Level Plan 07/07/2020-06/30/2023

span.p: *** Change *** Governor Wolf has announced that all schools are now closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year due to growing concerns statewide about the spread of the Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Southern Fulton has created a Continuity of Education plan that provides information as to how students are to be educated while our schools are shutdown. Click here to view the plan.
Click here to view Resources for K-12 Teachers/Students.
If you need assistance finding food, paying housing bills, accessing free childcare, or other essential services, please click on the link below.

p.strong: CORRECTION: Southern Fulton School District will be having kindergarten registration on June 1, 2020, and June 2, 2020. If you have children that will be 5 years old before August 1, 2020, please call the elementary school at 717-294-3400 to have your child placed on the registration list.

span.p: Please complete, save, and email the application to hbrewer@fcfpinc.org.
If you have the ability to print it out, you are welcome to do that and mail it to Hannah Brewer at:
